snippet: Gov. Rick Perry will make his first court appearance on Oct. 31 as his lawyers tries to quash the two felony counts of abuse of power.
abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry will make his first court appearance on Oct 31 as his lawyers try to quash two felony counts of abuse of power filed against him.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry will make his first court appearance on Oct. 31 as his lawyers tries to quash the two felony counts of abuse of power.

headline.main: Texas: Court Date Is Set for Perry
headline.print_headline: Texas: Court Date Is Set for Perry
